sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../styles/tour-details.css'; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import tourData from '../assets/data/tours'; import calculateAvgRating from '../utilities/avgRating'; import avatar from '../assets/images/avatar.jpg'; const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() // PLEASE NOTE // This is currently static data. // API call to load data from database to be implemented later const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id === id); ; // De-structure tour object properties const {title, location, time, price, maxGroupSize, desc, reviews, photo} = tour; const {totalRating, avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews); return <>
{/* tour info start */}

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? 'Not rated' : ({reviews.length})} {location}
${price} per person {time} {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* tour info end */} {/* reviews section start */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{ reviews?.map(review=>(
{review.name}

13 March 2024

{review.rating}
{review.review};
)) }
{/* reviews section end */}
}; export default TourDetails;
